steps.title: Request Submission
steps.description: You leave a request on the website or contact us by phone.

steps.title: Agreement
steps.description: We consult you, agree on the price, and arrange the exact time for our specialist to arrive.

steps.title: Product Delivery and Installation
steps.description: Our lock installation specialist arrives at the agreed time and location.

features.title: Double Cost Return
features.description: For every defective product sent, we will return double the cost.

features.title: Installation
features.description: We carry out installation work of any complexity at a convenient time for you.

features.title: Product Branding
features.description: We apply your logo to our products to make them more exclusive.

questionsDescription: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. We are happy to assist you!
